raw_body: DIRCKZE – NINNETTE HILDA (nee Jansz). Loving wife of the late Brian Dirckze,​ loving daughter of the late Kenneth and Hilda Jansz,​ loving sister of Brian,​ Carmen,​ Winston and the lates Mervyn,​ Kingston,​ Elmo,​ Pamela,​ Bubsy and Patrick,​ mother of Yvonne Windsor,​ Penelope Von Meybrink,​ Deanna Francis,​ Mignonne Richardson,​ Edward Dirckze,​ Maxwell Dirckze and Graham Dirckze,​ loving mother-in-law of the late Hemantha Windsor,​ Irwin Von Meybrink,​ Christopher Francis and Doug Richardson,​ loving grandmother of Venetia,​ Ramon,​ Desmond,​ Aaron,​ Chantelle,​ Minelle,​ Melissa,​ Amanda,​ Shane,​ Cassandra,​ Craig,​ William,​ Shania and Jonathan,​ loving great-grandmother of Chanelle,​ Nathaniel,​ Isla,​ Angela,​ Isaiah,​ Alina and Briella. Funeral Mass will be offered at St Anthony’s Catholic Church,​ 90 Buckley St,​ Noble Park on Thursday 16 May 2024 at 1:15 p.m. (Australia). Rosary and Viewing commencing on Wednesday 15 May 2024 at 6:30 p.m. at St Anthony’s Catholic Church,​ Noble Park.   032067
